segments.text: Have you run into your cousin Jimmy lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a matter of fact , I have . I ran into him just the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too well . He had to have four teeth pulled last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time you see him , please tell him I'm thinking of him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be sure to do that .
segments.speaker: S2
